Class ManagerMenu

java.lang.Object
TesterMenu
ManagerMenu
public class ManagerMenu extends TesterMenu
Represents the menu interface specifically designed for the Manager role.

This class extends TesterMenu and provides administrative functionalities such as creating, updating, listing, and deleting users. It also includes statistical reporting for contacts and an undo mechanism for user management actions.

  • Constructor Details

    • ManagerMenu

      public ManagerMenu(String username, String fullName, String role, Scanner scanner, String passwordStrengthAtLogin)
      Constructs a new ManagerMenu instance.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the currently logged-in manager.
      fullName - The full name of the currently logged-in manager.
      role - The role of the user (expected to be "Manager").
      scanner - The shared Scanner instance for user input.
      passwordStrengthAtLogin - The strength evaluation of the manager's current password.

  • Method Details

    • showMenu

      public void showMenu()
      Displays the main menu loop for the Manager.

      Provides options to change password, list users, add users, update users, delete users, view statistics, undo the last action, or logout.

      Overrides:
      showMenu in class TesterMenu
